text: EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT This Employment Agreement is entered into on 01-02-2024 between: Employer: ABC Technologies Pvt Ltd Employee: Mr. Karthik Designation: Software Engineer Terms of Employment: 1. The employee shall receive a monthly salary of Rs. 50,000. 2. The employee shall not disclose confidential company information. 3. Either party may terminate the employment by giving 30 days notice. Non-Compete Clause: The employee shall not engage in competing business for a period of one year after termination. Jurisdiction: Any disputes shall be subject to the jurisdiction of Chennai courts.
